text: rahe ve log jinhonne inakaar kiya unake karm chatiyal maidaan mein mareechika kee tarah hai ki pyaasa use paanee samajhata hai, yahaan tak ki jab vah usake paas pahuncha to use kuchh bhee na paaya. alabatta allaah hee ko usake paas paaya, jisane usaka hisaab poora-poora chuka diya. aur allaah bahut jald hisaab karata hai
